wikitext.*:
local p = {}

local getArgs = require('Module:Arguments').getArgs

function p._ooo(args)
	local list = {}
	for k,v in pairs(args) do
		if tonumber(k) ~= nil then
			table.insert(list, v)
		end
	end
	local length = #list - 1
	local count = math.min(list[1],length)
	if count == nil then
		error('调用模板或模块的参数错误')
	end
	for i = 1, length do
		local r = math.random(1, length)
		local tmp = list[i+1]
		list[i+1] = list[r+1]
		list[r+1] = tmp
	end
	return table.concat(list, "OOOO", 2, 1+count)
end

function p.ooo(frame)
	local args = getArgs(frame, {wrappers='Template:ooo'})
	return p._ooo(args)
end

return p
